name: Sei Hackathon Showcase
description: Complete showcase of Zyra's Sei Network integration capabilities for hackathon demo

config.systemPrompt: You are a Zyra platform demonstrator for the Sei Network hackathon. Provide an engaging introduction to the demo.

inputs.prompt: Welcome to the Zyra x Sei Network Hackathon Demo! Introduce what we'll be showcasing: AI-powered workflow automation on Sei Network, including native Sei tools, GOAT SDK integration, and real-time blockchain operations.

config.systemPrompt: You are a Sei Network expert. Use the tools to get live network data and explain Sei's capabilities.

inputs.prompt: Get current Sei Network information and explain why Sei is perfect for high-frequency trading and DeFi applications. Highlight the current network status, gas prices, and block times.

config.systemPrompt: You are demonstrating Zyra's wallet integration capabilities on Sei Network.

inputs.prompt: Demonstrate wallet setup: get my Sei wallet address and check the current SEI balance. Explain how Zyra seamlessly connects to Sei Network for automated operations.

config.systemPrompt: You are showcasing GOAT SDK integration on Sei Network.

inputs.prompt: Demonstrate GOAT SDK integration: get wallet address and balance using GOAT tools. Show how Zyra supports multiple blockchain SDK approaches on Sei Network.

config.systemPrompt: You are demonstrating Zyra's transaction capabilities on Sei Network.

inputs.prompt: Demonstrate transaction capabilities: estimate gas for sending 0.01 SEI to address {{demoRecipient}}. Explain how Zyra provides cost estimates before executing transactions.

config.systemPrompt: You are demonstrating Zyra's AI reasoning capabilities for blockchain operations.

inputs.prompt: Analyze all the data we've gathered so far: network info {{sei-network-overview.response}}, wallet setup {{wallet-setup-demo.response}}, GOAT comparison {{goat-sdk-comparison.response}}, and transaction estimates {{transaction-capabilities.response}}. Provide intelligent insights about optimal strategies for this user's Sei operations.

config.systemPrompt: You are showcasing Zyra's automation capabilities for Sei Network.

inputs.prompt: Demonstrate how this workflow could be automated. Based on the AI analysis {{ai-reasoning-showcase.response}}, explain how users could set up automated DeFi strategies, portfolio rebalancing, or trading bots on Sei Network using Zyra's workflow system.

config.systemPrompt: You are a blockchain strategist explaining real-world use cases.

inputs.prompt: Present 3 compelling real-world scenarios where Zyra + Sei Network would excel: 1) High-frequency trading automation, 2) Cross-chain DeFi strategies, 3) GameFi token management. Use the technical capabilities we've demonstrated to support each scenario.

config.systemPrompt: You are concluding the Zyra x Sei Network hackathon demonstration.

inputs.prompt: Create a compelling hackathon summary highlighting: 1) What we built (native Sei integration + GOAT SDK support), 2) Technical achievements (AI tool discovery fixes, parameter validation improvements), 3) Impact potential (democratizing blockchain automation), 4) Next steps for Sei ecosystem growth. Reference key demo points: {{automation-example.response}} and {{real-world-scenarios.response}}

requirements: Both Sei Network and GOAT MCP servers configured
Valid wallet private key with some SEI balance
Stable internet connection for live demo
metadata.description: This is the flagship hackathon demonstration workflow showcasing Zyra's complete Sei Network integration. It demonstrates native Sei tools, GOAT SDK integration, AI-powered analysis, and real-world automation scenarios.

demoRecipient.description: Safe recipient address for demo transaction estimates
